MKT 20 ENE MSP IWD 15 E CMX 30 E MQT 20 E GRB 30 E MSN 30 WNW MLI 20
NNE OXV 25 ESE SLB 15 NE SPW 10 WNW MKT.

ANJ 20 WSW PLN RAC 40 NE UIN 25 WNW SZL 45 SSE DDC EHA 25 SSW LAA 40
WSW MCK HSI 15 N TQE 30 SW RWF 20 SW STC 110 NNE CMX.
